brief: La clase cliente used to create client Objects which connect to a server to exchange data

methods.name: active()
methods.desc: Returns true if this client is still active

methods.name: ip()
methods.desc: Returns the IP address of the machine as a String

methods.name: available()
methods.desc: Returns the number of bytes in the buffer waiting to be read

methods.name: read()
methods.desc: Returns a value from the buffer

methods.name: readChar()
methods.desc: Returns the next byte in the buffer as a char

methods.name: readBytes()
methods.desc: Reads a group of bytes from the buffer

methods.name: readBytesUntil()
methods.desc: Reads from the buffer of bytes up to and including a particular character

methods.name: readStringUntil()
methods.desc: Returns the buffer as a String up to and including a particular character

description:
A client connects to a server and sends data back and forth. If anything 
 goes wrong with the connection, for example the host is not there or is 
 listening on a different port, an exception is thrown.
name: Client

parameters.name: port
parameters.description: port to read/write from on the server
